text:
Was warmly greeted by the staff when entering the restaurant. Pleasantly surprised by the complimentary welcome drink which was brilliant.

Food order was taken quickly and staff was very polite. Food serves quickly and every dish looks amazing with great taste. Staff even served us complimentary water halfway through the meal.

Overall my family had a great pleasant lunch at Chef's Playground. Thanks for the good service and nice food.

Loved their pesto chicken on my first visit. Pesto sauce is made in-house; and taste really fresh and nice!

Today is my second visit, pesto chicken didn‚Äôt taste as good (not sure why, could be due to different batches of basil); and tried their mentai scallop pasta. Am amazed with the balance taste of the pasta, and didn‚Äôt get sick and tried when completing the plate of pasta. We finished off with a salted caramel coffee cake, and are surprised with the quality for the price it is at.

In all, would recommend others to here.

Had a really great experience dining at @chefsplaygroundsingapore The food was super delicious, every dish was cooked perfectly and packed with flavor. From the moment we arrived, the staff made us feel so welcome. Their service was very friendly and attentive, always making sure we were comfortable and enjoying our meal.‚ù§Ô∏èüòã

It‚Äôs not just a place to eat but a place where you can truly enjoy the atmosphere with good company. The overall vibe is cozy and clean, and you can tell the team there really cares about what they do.‚ù§Ô∏è

If you‚Äôre looking for a spot with tasty food and great service, this is the place to go. I highly recommend everyone to come and try this restaurant. You‚Äôll definitely leave with a happy heart and full stomach. I‚Äôll for sure come back again.‚ù§Ô∏è

Sudden craving for steak so decided to give this place a try...

Was pleasantly surprised at the food offered! We tried their ribs and rib-eye.

Meat was soft and juicy, fresh and good portion
